name: Ronaldinho Soccer 64
overview: This is a rare ROM hack of the popular "International Superstar Soccer 64" from peruvian group "Twin Eagles Group", the same creators of "Campeonato Brasileiro 96", "Ronaldinho Soccer 97" and "Ronaldinho Soccer 98" for the SNES. Players names are now based on it's real life counterparts and a brand new narration in "portuguese" gives an extra layer of fun to the classic. The gameplay mechanic is exactly the same as the original game.
